source.8f83d932:
# Instagram Post Reach prediction:

    - Likes prediction of an instagram post using Linear Regression.
    - The dataset has about 8 columns and 100 rows.
    - The columns has details such as username, caption, followers, hastags used in the post, time since posted and Likes.
    - Likes column is the predictor variable in our model.
    - Model Used : Linear Regression.
    - Metrics used : MSE.
